exclusion.criterion: SpO2 at rest < 90% or a sustained decrease of > 4% in arterial O2 saturation during the ergometer test, as determined by pulse oximetry
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: other medical conditions which could cause or contribute to breathlessness, i.e., heart disease or other respiratory diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has COPD and severe chronic breathlessness. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status with hypoxia and O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
